title: Senior Business Developer - Retail
description:
Vi söker dig som vill skapa framtidens digitala lösningar, göra skillnad, och utmana det som finns idag och som tror att teknik, data och kreativitet kan förbättra världen. Vi har verktygen, möjligheterna och ambitionen att skapa verklig effekt.  

  

Vi är CGI. Vårt mål är att göra vardagen enklare, smartare och mer hållbar genom innovativa digitala tjänster. Vi utvecklar lösningar som möjliggör hemleverans av matvaror, säkra betallösningar och system som hjälper lokala butiker att växa. Hos oss arbetar du med att skapa sömlösa kundupplevelser, effektiva leveranskedjor, stabil drift och hållbar transformation.  

  

Är du redo att bli en del av vår resa? Välkommen till CGI – tillsammans formar vi framtiden!

**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter**


Som Senior Business Developer Retail hos CGI får du en nyckelroll i att utveckla våra retail-kunders affärer. Du driver nya marknadsmöjligheter, etablerar långsiktiga partnerskap och kombinerar kommersiell strategi med teknisk förståelse. Med data, AI och moderna plattformar skapar du verklig affärseffekt.  

  

Du ansvarar för hela utvecklingsresan – från marknadsanalys och strategisk rådgivning till kravställning, genomförande och resultatdriven uppföljning.
  

  

Dina uppgifter inkluderar att:  

* Leda kommersiella och strategiska initiativ för retail-kunder (unified commerce, e-commerce, butikseffektivitet, lojalitet, pricing).
* Identifiera marknadstrender och kundinsikter som omsätts till nya affärsmöjligheter och erbjudanden.
* Driva analys- och innovationsprojekt med fokus på AI, data, forecasting, personalisering och optimering av försäljning och kundupplevelse.
* Rådgiva kring kommersiell styrning och KPI-modeller (GM%, CLV, churn, konvertering, basket size) och stödja strategiska prioriteringar.
* Utforma go-to-market-strategier, koncept och roadmapar för retailens framtida behov.
* Bygga långsiktiga kundrelationer och agera som strategisk partner i transformationsresor.
* Samverka med tekniska team för att säkerställa skalbara, datadrivna och affärsnära lösningar.
* Bidra till kunskapsdelning och utveckla CGI:s retail-erbjudande genom case, metodik, workshops och thought leadership.
**Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll**


Vi söker dig som har:  

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av affärsutveckling inom detaljhandel eller närliggande konsumentdrivna branscher.
* God förståelse för retail-ekosystemet — från supply chain och category management till försäljning, digital handel och kundlojalitet.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta datadrivet och omsätta insikter till kommersiella beslut och strategier.
* Förmåga att kombinera affärsförståelse med teknisk rådgivning, särskilt inom AI, data och digitalisering.
* Vana av att arbeta i kundnära roller med dialoger på ledningsnivå.
* Meriterande: erfarenhet av P&L-ansvar, GTM-strategier, förändringsledning eller arbete med större transformationsprogram.

  

**Vem är du?**  

Du är strategisk, affärsorienterad och initiativrik. Du trivs i en rådgivande roll, är kommunikativ, analytisk och skapar energi omkring dig. Framför allt drivs du av att skapa mätbara resultat och utveckla hållbara retail-affärer i en snabbt föränderlig marknad.  

  

**Låter rollen som Senior Business Developer som nästa steg för dig?**
  

Ansök redan idag – vi hanterar ansökningar löpande. För frågor, kontakta:
  

Mette Pettersen – m.pettersen@cgi.com  

  

**Varför CGI?**  

Hos CGI får du kombinera affärsutveckling, strategi och innovation i en miljö där du arbetar både operativt och strategiskt. Du får möjlighet att påverka framtidens retail genom arbete med marknadsledande kunder, data- och AI-initiativ samt strategiska transformationsprojekt**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**  

  

Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.  

  

Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.  

  

Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.  

  

Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
  

  

Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.
company_description: Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare till Naval Combat Systems!
description:
*Vi vill bli fler! Vi söker för närvarande erfarna mjukvaruutvecklare till vår utvecklingsavdelning inom marin mjukvara för framtidens försvar, mer specifikt vår framgångsrika produkt – 9LV Combat Management System. Vi hanterar alla aspekter av utveckling från grunden – från plattformslösningar till användargränsytor.*

  

Din roll


Vi behöver nu växa ytterligare inom distribution applications software. Våra mjukvaru-team ansvarar autonomt för sin kravhantering, design, implementation och test av mjukvara samt all detaljplanering som rör funktionen i de marina ledningssystemen. Våra kundprojekt ansvarar för att varje fartygsklass får ett system som är skräddarsytt efter deras behov.


För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har viss kunskap inom ett eller flera av följande områden:

* DDS eller enterprise bus
* GIS
* Linux (Debian/Ubuntu) och operativ-systemnära funktioner
* Java, C/C++(MISRA), Golang, Python
* Cloud technologies
* Automatiserade tester
* IT Säkerhet


Som mjukvaruutvecklare arbetar du med att leverera beställd funktionalitet, i rätt tid och till överenskommen budget. Det betyder att du kommer att arbeta praktiskt i teamets backlog för både sprint- och kvartalsplaneringar.

  




Din profil


Vi tror att du har arbetat med mjukvaruutveckling i minst 3 år och nu känner dig redo för att testa en ny aspekt av mjukvaruutveckling. Du är intresserad av att bidra till det gemensamma genom att kommunicera med alla, från andra utvecklare, scrum masters och produktägare till kundprojektledare. Vi tror därför att du har ett samarbetstänkande där du kan se saker ur olika perspektiv som också uppmuntrar till ett öppet, förtroendefullt och innovativt klimat. Som person är du verkligen en doer, villig att lösa alla problem som behövs för att hjälpa organisationen att klara sina leveranser. Du har förmågan att kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska, såväl i tal som skrift.

 *Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*

  

Vad du kommer att vara en del av


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 19 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare, mer hållbar och mer rättvis värld. Läs mer om oss här


Affärsområdet Surveillance erbjuder världsledande sensorteknik inom övervakning och beslutsstöd för att skydda mot hot. Portföljen omfattar luftburna, markbaserade och marina radarer, elektronisk krigföring, stridsledning, flygsystem och cybersäkerhet. Om du är intresserad av vilka förmåner som du kan ta del av som anställd på Saab i Sverige, kan du läsa om dem här


Vår affärsenhet Naval Combat Systems levererar världsledande ledningssystem, produkter och tjänster till försvarsmakter världen över. Vi verkar globalt med kontor i Sverige, Australien, Finland och Tyskland.


Länkarna nedan ger dig en fingervisning om vad du kommer att vara med och bygga.

  

Välkommen ombord!  

  

https://saab.com/naval/decision-superiority/combat-management-systems/9lv-cms/


https://saab.screen9.tv/media/jS6nYMGoS3EE3M4op\_MyKw/9lv-combat-system-short-version

*Saab är ett företag där människan står i centrum. Vi har en god arbetsmiljö där vi stöttar och hjälper varandra att göra vårt bästa. Kontinuerligt lärande, välmående, karriär- och talangutveckling är exempel på områden där vi alltid arbetar hårt för att säkerställa att du som medarbetare får de möjligheter som du behöver.*
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Systemutvecklare Integration
description:
*Vi tror att framsteg och möjligheter skapas bäst tillsammans. Välkommen till en plats där samarbete gör skillnad.*

Din roll


Är du redo att bygga broar mellan system och ta integration till nästa nivå? På Saab står vi inför en spännande resa – från BizTalk till Azure Integration Services – och vi behöver dig som vill vara med och forma framtiden.


Vad du kommer att göra:

* Skapa smarta, skalbara och säkra integrationslösningar med Azure Logic Apps, Functions och API Management.
* Jobba nära arkitekter och kollegor för att lösa kluriga integrationsutmaningar.
* Utforska nya teknologier och bidra med idéer som gör oss ännu bättre.


Placeringsort är flexibel mellan Linköping, Göteborg eller Stockholm – men vi ser gärna att du hänger med oss i Linköping i början för att komma in i gänget. I denna tjänst kommer det finnas möjlighet att arbeta på distans del av tiden.


Din profil


För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du:

* Har erfarenhet av systemintegration och gillar att bygga lösningar som håller över tid.
* Har kunskap inom Azure-tjänster som Logic Apps, Functions eller API Management eller liknande
* Är nyfiken, gillar att lära dig nytt och delar gärna kunskap med andra.
* Har utbildning inom IT och kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska.


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vad du blir en del av


Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här

*Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.*
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: React Native Developer
description:
**We are looking for a React Native Developer who likes turning real constraints into thoughtful product experiences. Join us!**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  



**Do you love the creative chaos of cross platform development, from the “it works everywhere!” highs to the “why is iOS like this?” lows? At Framna, you get the fun stuff: TypeScript, UI polish, platform personality quirks, and the satisfaction of building apps that genuinely feel like one unified product experience. We are looking for a React Native Developer who likes turning real constraints into thoughtful product experiences. You will join a team where autonomy is valued, curiosity is encouraged, and helping each other move forward is simply how we work.**

**Become part of the team**
---------------------------


Framna partners with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, like Swish, SJ, Essity, and SEB, to create digital products that define markets and deliver real-world impact. We are now more than 600 people across ten studios, building apps used by millions every day.


As our next React Native Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional product team of designers, developers, QA engineers, analysts, and product leads who take ideas from first concept to real-world product. You will also join the Cross Platform competence area, a company-wide group where app developers meet regularly to exchange knowledge, deepen their skills, and grow professionally together.

**What you’ll do**
------------------


This role blends hands-on engineering, problem-solving across platforms, and supporting your teammates to deliver good-quality product experiences.


Specifically, you will:

* Build and maintain React Native applications used by millions of users.
* Write high-quality TypeScript and ensure your features work beautifully across both Android and iOS. To do this, we embrace and utilize both your expertise as well as AI-powered tooling.
* Collaborate closely with designers and product teams to bring concepts to life with smooth UI, thoughtful interactions, and polished app behavior.
* Navigate platform-specific challenges, and know when it is time to dip into Android/iOS native modules.
* Help shape technical decisions, contribute to architectural discussions, and drive the team forward with clear communication.
* Support teammates through code reviews, knowledge sharing, and (if you enjoy it) mentoring.
* Work directly with partners and stakeholders to understand needs, communicate progress, and make thoughtful trade-offs.

**Who you are**
---------------


We think you will thrive here if you enjoy variety, care about quality, and love the craft of mobile development. You might recognise yourself if you:

* Have a few years of professional mobile development experience, ideally across Android, iOS, and/or React Native.
* Have worked hands-on with React Native and feel comfortable building features end-to-end.
* Work confidently in TypeScript and have an interest in deeper platform understanding.
* Understand platform differences and enjoy solving cross-platform challenges.
* Feel comfortable with autonomy, taking the lead on parts of the app, making decisions, and helping others move forward.
* Find it meaningful to support or coach others.
* Communicate clearly and enjoy collaborating with designers, product leads, teammates, and partners.
* Care about shipping great products and making users’ everyday lives easier.

**About Framna**
----------------


Framna means ‘to bring forward’ in Old Norse. And that is exactly what we do. We partner with industry leaders (and those about to be) to create excellent digital products that define markets, reshape industries, and deliver meaningful impact.


Born from the union of digital agencies Bontouch, Move, and Shape, Framna emerged from a strong, product-led culture. Today, over 600 of us collaborate across ten studios in Denmark, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.


Every day, millions of users around the world rely on the products we help shape. From seamless payments to daily commutes, from better health management to smarter shopping. Our work consistently earns an average App Store rating of 4.5.


Together with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, including Essity, SJ, Swish, and SEB, we craft products that lead markets and push boundaries. Because when products win, businesses win. We call it Win by product.

**What you get**
----------------

* **For us, it’s office first.** Our cozy Stockholm office is our main location for work. Right in the middle of the city - a welcoming space where there’s always something happening, whether it is a demo, a fika, or someone testing out a new idea. We spend time together to build culture, optimize for stronger collaboration, better products, and greater value for our partners and challenging ourselves while having fun doing it. We mix that with the freedom to work from home when it makes sense, and hours that flex around real life.
* **A culture of curiosity.** On Fridays we have weekly demos, Wednesdays mean lunch-and-learns, and sometimes we throw ourselves into conceptathons just to see what happens. We gather for company conferences just to share ideas, and we take time to learn something new when needed.
* **The freedom to follow your “what if.”** We believe the best roles are shaped by the people in them. If you are curious about something, you will have the trust and space to chase it, and probably a few teammates who want to jump in with you.
* **Teammates who bring their whole selves.** Designers who doodle during standups, engineers who can’t resist showing off a clever hack, product leads who keep the energy up when things get tricky. Around here, people genuinely like sharing what they know and celebrating when someone tries something new.
* **And of course, the benefits you’d expect.** A generous wellness grant, top-up on your parental leave, occupational pension, and plenty more to make life outside of work easier.

**Our hiring process**
----------------------


* First interview with our recruiter, Josephine


* Case assignment


* Technical interview with two developers


* Final meeting with our Head of Cross Platform


**Please note:** For this role, you need to be based in Sweden. Unfortunately, we are not able to offer relocation.


Department
Engineering
Locations
Stockholm
Employment type
Full-time

**About Framna**
----------------

Framna is a diverse and global team of builders, thinkers, and creators. We are united by one mission: to craft digital products that make everyday life better for millions of people worldwide. Today, over 600 of us collaborate across ten studios in Denmark, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.


Our name, rooted in Old Norse, means “to bring forward.” And that is exactly what we do. We partner with industry leaders (and those about to be) to create digital products that define markets, reshape industries, and drive meaningful growth. We call it Win by product.

title: Senior Android Developer
description:
**If you like shaping direction, levelling up others, and creating apps that feel smooth, modern, and genuinely delightful to use, we would love to meet you!**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  



**Are you the kind of Android developer who can spot a bad architecture decision from a mile away and still gets excited about a really elegant Kotlin extension? The person who loves untangling complexity, but also cares that the loading animation feels** ***just right*****? At Framna, we are looking for a Senior Android Developer who enjoys the mix of big thinking and hands-on building. Someone who can guide a team through tough technical calls, champion great Android craft, and still have fun doing it. If you like shaping direction, levelling up others, and creating apps that feel smooth, modern, and genuinely delightful to use, we would love to meet you.**

**Become part of the team**
---------------------------


Framna partners with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, like Swish, SJ, Essity, and SEB, to create digital products that define markets and deliver real-world impact. We are now more than 600 people across ten studios, building apps used by millions every day.


As our next Lead Android Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional product team of designers, developers, QA engineers, analysts, and product leads who take ideas from first concept to real-world product. You will also take on a broader role, guiding technical decisions, coaching teammates, and ensuring the team builds with both quality and long-term thinking in mind.


On top of that you will contribute to our Android competence area, a company-wide group where app developers meet regularly to exchange knowledge, deepen their skills, and grow professionally together.

**What you will do**
--------------------


As a Senior Android Developer, you will combine hands-on building with technical leadership to shape how we create world-class Android experiences.


More specifically, you will:

* Build modern Android apps using Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Android’s latest libraries and patterns.
* Define and uphold high engineering standards, clean architecture, maintainability, testability, and strong performance.
* Work closely with designers and your product team to craft Android-native interactions, animations, and UI that feel polished, intuitive, and delightful.
* Identify and solve platform-specific challenges, and help the team make informed decisions on architecture, libraries, and long-term maintainability.
* Lead technical conversations, facilitate decision-making, and provide clarity in complex or ambiguous situations.
* Mentor and support fellow developers through reviews, knowledge-sharing, and pair programming.
* Collaborate with product managers, partners, and stakeholders to understand needs, scope work, and represent the Android perspective in discussions.

**Who you are**
---------------


You will thrive here if you enjoy variety, care about quality, and love the craft of Android development, both in your own work and in supporting others. You might recognise yourself if you:

* Have several years of professional Android development experience and feel confident building modern apps end-to-end in Kotlin.
* Understand the Android platform deeply, from Jetpack Compose and architecture patterns to performance, testing, and platform quirks.
* Can lead technical discussions, frame trade-offs clearly, and guide the team toward sound architectural decisions.
* Communicate clearly and collaborate smoothly with designers, product leads, and partners.
* Enjoy mentoring, coaching, and uplifting teammates, and you naturally help create a supportive engineering culture.
* Take ownership, bring structure to ambiguity, and care that what the team builds is maintainable, scalable, and genuinely useful to users.
* Feel comfortable navigating complex domains and solving problems with both curiosity and pragmatism.
* It's a plus if you speak Swedish.

**About Framna**
----------------

Born from the union of digital agencies Bontouch, Move, and Shape, Framna emerged from a strong, product-led culture. Today, over 600 of us collaborate across ten studios in Denmark, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.


Every day, millions of users around the world rely on the products we help shape. From seamless payments to daily commutes, from better health management to smarter shopping. Our work consistently earns an average App Store rating of 4.5.


Together with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, including Essity, SJ, Swish, and SEB, we craft products that lead markets and push boundaries. Because when products win, businesses win. We call it Win by product.

**What you get**
----------------

* **For us, it’s office first.** Our cozy Stockholm office is our main location for work. Right in the middle of the city - a welcoming space where there’s always something happening, whether it is a demo, a fika, or someone testing out a new idea. We spend time together to build culture, optimize for stronger collaboration, better products, and greater value for our partners and challenging ourselves while having fun doing it. We mix that with the freedom to work from home when it makes sense, and hours that flex around real life.
* **A culture of curiosity.** On Fridays we have weekly demos, Wednesdays mean lunch-and-learns, and sometimes we throw ourselves into conceptathons just to see what happens. We gather for company conferences just to share ideas, and we take time to learn something new when needed.
* **The freedom to follow your “what if.”** We believe the best roles are shaped by the people in them. If you are curious about something, you will have the trust and space to chase it, and probably a few teammates who want to jump in with you.
* **Teammates who bring their whole selves.** Designers who doodle during standups, engineers who can’t resist showing off a clever hack, product leads who keep the energy up when things get tricky. Around here, people genuinely like sharing what they know and celebrating when someone tries something new.
* **And of course, the benefits you’d expect.** A generous wellness grant, top-up on your parental leave, occupational pension, and plenty more to make life outside of work easier.

title: Junior Android Developer
description:
**Are you ready to take the next step in their Android journey? Join us as our next Junior Android Developer and build apps used by millions!**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  



**Do you get a little spark of joy when your Compose UI finally snaps into place? Or when you realise you solved a bug** ***all by yourself*** **and suddenly feel like a genius? At Framna, we are looking for a Junior Android Developer who is excited to grow, curious about how great products are made, and ready to take the next step in their Android journey. If you love Kotlin, enjoy learning from others, and want to help build apps used by millions, all while being part of a supportive team where questions are welcome and learning is part of the job, we would love to meet you.**

**Become part of the team**
---------------------------


Framna partners with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, like Swish, SJ, Essity, and SEB, to create digital products that define markets and deliver real-world impact. We are now more than 600 people across ten studios, building apps used by millions every day.


As our next Junior Android Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional product team of designers, developers, QA engineers, analysts, and product leads who take ideas from first concept to real-world product.


On top of that you will contribute to our Android competence area, a company-wide group where app developers meet regularly to exchange knowledge, deepen their skills, and grow professionally together.

**What you will do**
--------------------


As a Junior Android Developer, you will work alongside experienced teammates to build modern Android experiences and grow your skills through hands-on learning.


More specifically, you will:

* Build features in Kotlin using Jetpack Compose and modern Android libraries.
* Contribute to clean, maintainable code and learn solid engineering practices along the way.
* Work closely with designers and your product team to bring UI ideas to life and make apps feel smooth, accessible, and user-friendly.
* Help solve platform-specific challenges and learn how to make good technical decisions with support from senior developers.
* Participate in technical discussions, pairing sessions, and code reviews to sharpen your craft.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and developers, gaining insight into how real products are built from concept to launch.
* Keep learning, stay curious, and grow your confidence as an Android developer.

**Who you are**
---------------


You will thrive here if you are curious, eager to learn, and genuinely excited about Android development. You might recognise yourself if you:

* Have around 1–2 years of experience building Android apps in Kotlin (professionally or through solid internships/personal projects).
* Know your way around modern Android development, ideally Jetpack Compose, or you are excited to dive in.
* Love learning from others and enjoy improving a little every day.
* Communicate clearly, ask a lot of questions, and collaborate well with designers and developers.
* Are comfortable taking feedback, trying new things, and exploring different ways to solve a problem.
* Care about user experience and want to build products that feel thoughtful and well made.
* It's a plus if you speak Swedish.

**About Framna**
----------------


Framna means ‘to bring forward’ in Old Norse. And that is exactly what we do. We partner with industry leaders (and those about to be) to create excellent digital products that define markets, reshape industries, and deliver meaningful impact.


Born from the union of digital agencies Bontouch, Move, and Shape, Framna emerged from a strong, product-led culture. Today, over 600 of us collaborate across ten studios in Denmark, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.


Every day, millions of users around the world rely on the products we help shape. From seamless payments to daily commutes, from better health management to smarter shopping. Our work consistently earns an average App Store rating of 4.5.


Together with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, including Essity, SJ, Swish, and SEB, we craft products that lead markets and push boundaries. Because when products win, businesses win. We call it Win by product.

**What you get**
----------------

* **For us, it’s office first.** Our cozy Stockholm office is our main location for work. Right in the middle of the city - a welcoming space where there’s always something happening, whether it is a demo, a fika, or someone testing out a new idea. We spend time together to build culture, optimize for stronger collaboration, better products, and greater value for our partners and challenging ourselves while having fun doing it. We mix that with the freedom to work from home when it makes sense, and hours that flex around real life.
* **A culture of curiosity.** On Fridays we have weekly demos, Wednesdays mean lunch-and-learns, and sometimes we throw ourselves into conceptathons just to see what happens. We gather for company conferences just to share ideas, and we take time to learn something new when needed.
* **The freedom to follow your “what if.”** We believe the best roles are shaped by the people in them. If you are curious about something, you will have the trust and space to chase it, and probably a few teammates who want to jump in with you.
* **Teammates who bring their whole selves.** Designers who doodle during standups, engineers who can’t resist showing off a clever hack, product leads who keep the energy up when things get tricky. Around here, people genuinely like sharing what they know and celebrating when someone tries something new.
* **And of course, the benefits you’d expect.** A generous wellness grant, top-up on your parental leave, occupational pension, and plenty more to make life outside of work easier.

**Please note:** For this role, you need to be based in Sweden. Unfortunately, we are not able to offer relocation.

title: Lead React Native Developer
description:
**We are looking for a Lead React Native Developer who can guide teams through those decisions, balancing user experience, performance, and platform quirks, while still loving hands-on coding. Join us!**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  



**Do you enjoy taking the complexity of cross-platform development and turning it into something clear, elegant, and reliable? The kind of person who can see the big picture, untangle tricky technical decisions, and still get joy from polishing the details that make an app feel truly great? At Framna, we are looking for a Lead React Native Developer who can guide teams through those decisions, balancing user experience, performance, and platform quirks, while still loving hands-on coding. You will help set the technical direction, unlock teammates, and shape products used by millions.**

**Become part of the team**
---------------------------


Framna partners with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, like Swish, SJ, Essity, and SEB, to create digital products that define markets and deliver real-world impact. We are now more than 600 people across ten studios, building apps used by millions every day.


As our next Lead React Native Developer, you will be part of a cross-functional product team of designers, developers, QA engineers, analysts, and product leads who take ideas from first concept to real-world product. You will also take on a broader role, guiding technical decisions, coaching teammates, and ensuring the team builds with both quality and long-term thinking in mind.


On top of that you will contribute to our Cross Platform competence area, a company-wide group where app developers meet regularly to exchange knowledge, deepen their skills, and grow professionally together.

**What you’ll do**
------------------


This role blends hands-on engineering, technical direction, and supporting your teammates to deliver high-quality product experiences.


More specifically, you will:

* Build and maintain React Native applications used by millions of users.
* Write high-quality TypeScript and ensure your features work beautifully across both Android and iOS. To do this, we embrace and utilize both your expertise as well as AI-powered tooling.
* Drive architectural and technical decisions, ensuring solutions are robust, scalable, and maintainable.
* Collaborate closely with designers and product teams to bring concepts to life with smooth UI, thoughtful interactions, and polished app behavior.
* Navigate platform-specific challenges, and help the team understand when (and how) to leverage native modules.
* Lead technical discussions, guide trade-offs, and bring clarity when decisions get complex.
* Support teammates through code reviews, coaching, pairing, and sharing knowledge across the Cross Platform competence area.
* Work directly with partners and stakeholders to clarify needs, shape solutions, and communicate progress clearly.

**Who you are**
---------------


We think you will thrive here if you enjoy variety, care about quality, and love the craft of mobile development, both in your own work and in helping others grow. You might recognise yourself if you:

* Have several years of professional mobile development experience across Android, iOS, and/or React Native.
* Feel confident building React Native features end-to-end and guiding others when needed.
* Work comfortably in TypeScript and enjoy exploring how the platforms behave under the hood.
* Can lead technical decisions, simplify complexity, and frame trade-offs clearly.
* Enjoy collaborating with designers, product leads, and partners, and you communicate with clarity.
* Like mentoring, coaching, or uplifting teammates, formally or informally.
* Feel comfortable taking ownership, shaping direction, and ensuring that what the team builds is both high-quality and long-lived.
* Care about shipping great products and making users’ everyday lives easier.

**About Framna**
----------------


Framna means ‘to bring forward’ in Old Norse. And that is exactly what we do. We partner with industry leaders (and those about to be) to create excellent digital products that define markets, reshape industries, and deliver meaningful impact.


Born from the union of digital agencies Bontouch, Move, and Shape, Framna emerged from a strong, product-led culture. Today, over 600 of us collaborate across ten studios in Denmark, the Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, and the US.


Every day, millions of users around the world rely on the products we help shape. From seamless payments to daily commutes, from better health management to smarter shopping. Our work consistently earns an average App Store rating of 4.5.


Together with some of the world’s most ambitious brands, including Essity, SJ, Swish, and SEB, we craft products that lead markets and push boundaries. Because when products win, businesses win. We call it Win by product.

**What you get**
----------------

* **The office is our default base of work.** This is about building culture, optimizing for stronger collaboration, better products, greater value for our partners and challenging ourselves while having fun doing it. Our Stockholm office is right in the middle of the city - a super cozy space where there’s always something happening, whether it is a demo, a fika, or someone testing out a new idea. We mix that with the freedom to work from home when it makes sense, and hours that flex around real life.
* **A culture of curiosity.** On Fridays we have weekly demos, Wednesdays mean lunch-and-learns, and sometimes we throw ourselves into conceptathons just to see what happens. We gather for company conferences just to share ideas, and we take time to learn something new when needed.
* **The freedom to follow your “what if.”** We believe the best roles are shaped by the people in them. If you are curious about something, you will have the trust and space to chase it, and probably a few teammates who want to jump in with you.
* **Teammates who bring their whole selves.** Designers who doodle during standups, engineers who can’t resist showing off a clever hack, product leads who keep the energy up when things get tricky. Around here, people genuinely like sharing what they know and celebrating when someone tries something new.
* **And of course, the benefits you’d expect.** A generous wellness grant, top-up on your parental leave, occupational pension, and plenty more to make life outside of work easier.

**Our hiring process**
----------------------


* First interview with our recruiter, Josephine


* Case assignment


* Technical interview with two developers


* Final meeting with our Head of Cross Platform


**Please note:** For this role, you need to be based in Sweden. Unfortunately, we are not able to offer relocation.
